dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: So New Balance just won a trademark case in a court in Astana, Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, the defendant agreed to pay 200,000 tenge in compensation and destroy all the counterfeit goods.

dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "As part of the settlement agreement, the defendant agreed to pay 200,000 tenge in compensation and destroy the goods bearing the New Balance trademark," the court stated.
